item.title: December_day_6
item.description: Leetcode December Challenge Day 6 Link to heading Link to the question Solution to the question """ # Definition for a Node. class Node: def __init__(self, val: int = 0, left: 'Node' = None, right: 'Node' = None, next: 'Node' = None): self.val = val self.left = left self.right = right self.next = next """ class Solution: def connect(self, root: 'Node') -> 'Node': if root == None: return None self.
